column5: Break the shackles of convention! There's nothing commonplace about relaxing in a pool with only the sites and sounds of nature to distract you. Hold your next getaway on this TWO ACRE retreat.   Easily seats 40 in covered and open areas about the property allow several separate functions. (Separate in-laws from out-laws) The oversize BBQ/Smoker will handle your culinary needs with an onsite fridge to accommodate your side dishes.   Comes see Five Palms and feel your cares disappear,
